pageTitle: Water Shield - WoWWiki - Your guide to the World of Warcraft
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {33465=/ Patch 2.0.1 (05-Dec-2006): Added as a new ability for The Burning Crusade. Patch 2.3.0 (13-Nov-2007): Mana cost removed. Mana gained per orb doubled. Duration reduced from 10 minutes to 1 minute. At the end of the duration, mana is gained for each remaining globe. Patch 2.3.2 (2008-01-08): Duration back to 10 minutes. No longer grants mana when expiring. Now provides passive mana regeneration instead. / Patch 3.0.2 (14-Oct-2008): Ranks 1-6 added, making the spell trainable at level 20. The spell was previously not available until level 62.}
textBeforeTable: Rank table [show] Contents Water Shield is a Nature-based shaman buff. The spell improves mana regeneration, and when taking damage, it restores mana to the caster. Water Shield can only proc every few seconds and has three charges. Increase mana regeneration and restores mana when enemies strike you. If you are gettin glow on mana, use this instead of Lightning Shield. Instant cast Water Shield Duration: 10 min. or 3 charges X mana per 5 sec. Attacks and spells used against you restore Y mana. 3 charges. Water Shield Magic
